name: Description in Zip File
summary: A DIZ file is a plain text file known as a "Description in Zip" (DIZ) file that describes the contents, such as a program or files, compressed in a .ZIP archive. It is a small file since it contains a brief description that typically consists of 10 lines of text or less, with each line being less than 45 characters. Any text editor can open and edit DIZ files since they store plain text.
